category: Aromatic Substances that Open the Orifices

action.primary: Strongly opens the Orifices and Luo vessels, revives the Spirit and unblocks closed disorders

indications: Ying Stage Heat Attacks the Pericardium due to a Warm pathogen disease with convulsions, delirium, stupor and fainting
Closed disorders (Yang Obstruction, Yin Obstruction, Phlegm Obstruction)

action.primary: Invigorates the Blood, dissipates masses, reduces swellings, detoxifies, opens the channels and alleviates pain

indications: Severe problems due to Blood Stasis including fixed palpable masses, toxic sores and carbuncles
Obstructions of the channels and collaterals due to traumatic injury or painful obstruction

action.primary: Hastens delivery and facilitates the passage of stillborns

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with Yin Deficiency with Heat signs.
Use with caution for those with hypertension.
Use with caution for those with allergies.
Use with caution for those with reduced Kidney function.
Use with caution for those with cerebral hyperactivity.
Use with caution for those with cerebral congestion.

Blazing Heat in the Pericardium stirring up Liver Wind with spasms and convulsions.
Loss of consciousness and convulsions secondary to fevers in children.
Cold closed disorders usually due to Cold-Dampness or Phlegm-Turbidity.
Amenorrhea.
Severe Blood Stasis problems including fixed abdominal masses.
Sudden, severe chest and abdominal pain.
Angina pectoris or arteriosclerosis due to Blood Stagnation in the chest.
Trauma induced injury and suppurating sores.
Immobile abdominal masses, and amenorrhea and dysmenorrhea due to Blood Stasis.
Organomegaly.
Severe hot sores and ulcerations, especially of the throat.
Severe Wind-Damp Bi.
Scrofula and Phlegm nodules.
Hastens delivery of stillborns or the placenta.
Revives closed patterns of Wind-Stroke or Phlegm Collapse.
Cramps and spasms in the channels due to miasmic Damp Qi of mountain mists.
Coma due to Heat.
Sore throat.
Impaired consciousness due to Heat and Phlegm, stroke, convulsions and/or heat stroke.
Tremors and convulsions.
Impaired consciousness due to Cold and Phlegm.
Carbuncles, sores and hot swellings.

notes: Due to this animal’s endangered status and the great expense of this herb, almost all of the commercially available product is either from raised deer, or synthesized muscone.
Because of its intensely aromatic, penetrating nature, this substance is used to treat a wide variety of problems that impair consciousness.
This herb also treats paralysis of the Intestines.
This herb may be used alone for immobile palpable masses or organomegaly.
It is highly valued and used in many patent medicines for congestion of Blood and Phlegm.
It is used to “remove filth”, and stimulate circulation.
One source says that it is used to treat gastritis.
It has been shown to inhibit the growth of cancer cells.
It is said to cure all sorts of diseases and eliminate all sorts of foul smells.
It is also said that this herb activates all senses and channels and cures all sorts of retention and abdominal masses.
One source says that stomatoma can be cured in three days by taking 3g of the ground herb with water.
This is the most intensely aromatic and penetrating herb in the Chinese materia medica.
It can be used internally or topically.

Because of its ability to invigorate Blood, reduce swelling, unblock Stagnation, stop pain, prevent necrosis and reduce inflammation, it is very effective at treating toxic swollen sores, abscesses, traumatic injuries, swelling and pain from stagnant Blood mobile and fixed abdominal masses and amenorrhea.

Both She Xiang and Borneolum #{BingPian} Bing Pian are acrid, mobile, piercing, open the Orifices and awaken the Spirit. They are often combined to treat loss of consciousness, delirium associated with febrile diseases, fainting due to Summerheat, Wind-Stroke and swollen sores due to Heat toxin. She Xiang more powerfully opens the Orifices, awakens the Spirit invigorates the Blood,unblocks the collaterals and reduces and disperses Qi and Blood Stagnation. It treats hematomas, traumatic injury and abdominal masses or amenorrhea due to Blood Stasis. Bing Pian dissipates Fire constraint, to reduce swelling and stop pain. It treats sore red eyes, mouth ulcers and toothache.

Both She Xiang and Styrax #{SuHeXiang} Su He Xiang are acrid, warm, aromatic, open the Orifices and awaken the Spirit. She Xiang is stronger at opening the Orifices, awakening the Spirit and unblocking the channels and collaterals to treat Qi and Blood Stagnation with swelling and pain. Su He Xiang more strongly clears away filth and expels Phlegm to treat turbid, filthy Qi and Wind-Stroke with overabundant Phlegm causing loss of consciousness.
